duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide financial reporting internally and externally.
Maintain current knowledge and follow all bank financial and security regulations and procedures.
Design and preparation of business line profitability, banker production reports, and product profitability.
Assist the department with preparation and review of various financial and regulatory reports.
Support internal and external financial audits and regulatory exams.
Support income tax accruals and deferred tax calculations.
Maintain compliance with internal controls, including the FDIC Improvement Act (FDICIA) framework.
Contribute feedback on overall improvement of processes, present conclusions and recommendations to management. Address and implement continual improvements.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Accounting, Finance, Business (CPA preferred)
